original_text: For you know that afterward, when he desired to inherit the blessing, he was rejected, for he found no chance to repent, though he sought it with tears.
korean_text: 너희가 아는 바와 같이 그가 그 후에 축복을 이어받으려고 눈물을 흘리며 구하되 버린 바가 되어 회개할 기회를 얻지 못하였느니라

sentences.original_text: afterward, when he desired to inherit the blessing,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그가 축복을 유업으로 받으려고 원했을 때,

sentences.original_text: for he found no chance to repent,
though he sought it with tears.
